meta.title: An Overview of the Tropu Kagyü Tradition

nodes.body: The Tropu Kagyü (khro phu bka' brgyud) order was named for Tropu (khro phu) Monastery in Tsang (gtsang), Central Tibet, founded in 1171 by Gyeltsa Rinchen Gön (rgyal tsha rin chen mgon, 1118-1195).
nodes.title: An Overview of the Tropu Kagyü Tradition
